attributes.action: announce a 2 year, 30pence per litre, fuel duty amnesty, as a means to staving of the current levels of inflation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is absolutely crystal clear that a reduction in the direct costs of motoring would not only alleviate increased inflation due to logistics costs, but that this would have the immediate knock on effect of reducing the rate of inflation of consumer products. Furthermore this would also equate to a household of two cars having an extra £30 per week to spend, which would have a far greater impact on the economy than any 0.25% cut in interest rates.
